platform.title: Digital Solutions for Health Organisations
platform.subtitle: and modernising staff requests
text: Our platform digitally connects Health Organisations with Agencies focussing on temporary staff in the health sector. Pressures in clinics is constantly increasing due to the current staff shortages.

medlink offers you digital solutions for recruitment of temporary staff and failure management. We optimise communication and coordination and your satisfaction is our top priority. Digitze your recruitment and failure management now.

features.title: Relieve Staff using our full digital service

list.title: Single point of contact for everyone
list.text: During shortage of staff we connect you with numerous health professional suppliers and find you temporary staff that suit your organisation. No more calling around to find a provider, No more 100s of emails from multiple providers. Use the full potential of your workers for essential tasks – they will thank you for it.

list.title: Immediate feedback
list.text: You receive responses from the providers digitally and in real time. Choose your workforce based on their profile and references. Within a few clicks you ensure replacement for your staff shortage.

list.title: Easing your burden, digitally
list.text: Using automated and standardised processes we reduce your workload and improve your daily working life. This way we lighten the number of tasks and ensure that your HR-Team can focus on more essential work.

how-it-work.title: Recruit temporary staff in 3 steps
how-it-work.subtitle: From the inquiry to the right offer within minutes: medlink saves you time and costs - with fully automatic completion processes and maximal transparency.

list.title: Inquiry
list.text: Within minutes, establish an inquiry profile for your organisation and make it available online. Our algorithms match and forward your inquiry to our network.

list.title: Fitting Offers
list.text: You will receive offers for your specific inquiry including qualifications and recommendations. This reduces your administrative overhead and lets you focus on filling the temporary post.

list.title: Fully automated
list.text: We aim to fully automate the processes in inquiry, replacement, contracting, and invoicing right here. This reduces administrative overhead and provides you will full transparency on the steps of filling these temporary posts.
Staff shortages are a constant issue in our organisation. We therefore like to use medlink as it gives us access to a large set of competent replacement staff, quickly and without fuss.
list.author: Markus H. (HR Manager)

list.text: medlink allows us to find replacement staff in the shortest time possible without having to spend time on calls and descriptions. This simplifies our day to day workdays and saves an immense amount of time.
list.author: Leonie. F

find-out-more.title: Manage temporary staff efficiently
find-out-more.text: Use our intelligent platform to optimise your personell needs.

contact-us-intro.title: Contact Us
contact-us-intro.text: We are here for you. Our colleagues are ready to take your call and help you with registration and usage of our platform.

meta.name: description
meta.content: Digital solutions in healthcare: ✓ Staff planning ✓ Increase efficiency ✓ automatic staff scheduling or off duty | Find out more at medlink

staff.title: Optimised staff deployment with digital solutions
text: Modernise your staff management. Bet on the innovative solutions of medlink. Our digital platform reduces overall administrative workload in daily tasks surrounding temporary staff recruitment.
We develop specialised solution for your daily challenges and adapt them to suit you. This way we establish an individualised digitial service which will lead to your long-term success.

list.title: Let internal staff easily choose their working days
Give staff the power to easily swap shifts
Ensure you always have staff even when they are sick
Digital staff management
list.text: Communicate in real-time and coordinate your staff within your department and across your organisation. Our standardised digital processes allow short-term alterations, staff enquirires, or direct sharing of relevant information.

list.title: Simplify shift swaps
list.text: In the case of short-term sickness or last minute shift changes, our platform allows your staff to swap shifts easily. With only a few clicks staff can ask to swap shifts with their buddies or across the organisation, reducing sickdays and the need for external staff.

list.title: Smart failure management
list.text: Open staff enquiries are automatically identified by the system and forwarded to relevant staff in your organisation. In the case, where no internal staff can be identified, the system will forward the enquiry to HR who can, with only a few clicks, advertise and identify external staff to cover the shift.

outcome.title: Increase efficiency with success
outcome.subtitle: Communicate and coordinate your team in real time within and between departments. Make full use of your available workforce without complicated communication setups or emails. Using digitised, standardised processes solve momentary changes to workforces schedules or ensure that important information is shared quickly and safely without requiring sharing of personal data.

list.title: 1.5 FTE
list.subtitle: More time for more important tasks

list.title: Our vision
list.text: The situation is well known: understaffed departments, overworked clinical staff, and overfilled hospitals. The founders of medlink know first hand what the implications are on nurses, doctors, and HR to fill these vacancies. Our vision is to simplify this process significantly through digitial innovative technologies.

list.title: About us
list.text: At medlink we combine expertise in medicine, informatics, and consulting to provide the best possible performance on all levels. Important for us the most important aspect is trust and responsibility. Supported by a strong network, we guide you to a new digital working world.

list.title: We complete you!
list.text: medlink is sponsored by the Ministry of Economics and Innovation and by the European Social Fund. In close collaboration with the Faculty of Economics and Social studies at the University of Cologne we integrate innovative technologies, such as artificial intelligence, to derive novel healtcare solutions. Together with you we ensure your success.

contact-us-intro.title: Contact Us
contact-us-intro.text: We are here for you. Our colleagues are ready to take your call and help you with registration and usage of our platform.

how_it_works.title: Personal beschaffen in 3 Schritten
how_it_works.subtitle: Si sine causa? quae fuerit causa, mox videro; interea hoc tenebo, si mihi probabis ea, quae dices,

subscription.text1: Erstellen Sie auf medlink innerhalb von einer Minute Ihr Anforderungsprofil und schalten Sie die Personalanfrage online. Unser Matching-Algorithmus leitet das individuelle Profil in Echtzeit an unser Personalnetzwerk weiter.
subscription.text2: Bereits nach wenigen Minuten erhalten Sie eine Auswahl an passgenauen Bewerbern. Die Personalprofile inkl. Qualifikationsnachweisen und Empfehlungen erleichtern Ihnen die Auswahl der optimalen Besetzung. So gehen Sie bereits im Vorfeld sicher, dass die Bewerber optimal in Ihr Team passen.
subscription.text3: Die komplette administrative Abwicklung der Vermittlungsprozesse übernimmt medlink für Sie in digitaler Form. Damit entlasten wir Sie vom Vertragsmanagement bis hin zur Rechnungsabwicklung. Gleichzeitig ist die maximale Transparenz gewährleistet: Sämtliche Schritte sind für Sie einzusehen und nachzuvollziehen.

1.title: medlink offers you access to an extensive network of new customers and personnel inquiries. Comfortable and transparent.
1.sub: We provide you with numerous service requests every day, from part-time and full-time jobs to temporary placements

advantage.header: Why recruitment agencies choose to work with us.

1.title: Maximize customer network
1.text: Increase your order generation considerably by networking with a large pool of clinics and benefit from exclusive offers with our partner clinics.

2.title: Create space for important things
2.text: We relieve you of administrative tasks through digital, standardized processes. We support you in contract and invoice creation and in communication with customers.

3.title: Real-time notification
3.text: Get new job details directly from medlink and once you suggest a replacement get immediate acknowledgement. All contract generation is automatic and works like it is supposed to without any large challenges.

process.sub: Transparent and convenient - medlink makes it easy to win orders.

1.title: Receive job requests
1.text: You receive tailored inquiries for your employees directly on the platform. You can adapt your preferences easily within our application and ensure that you only receive those inquiries that suits your employee portfolio best.

2.title: Direct matching
2.text: With just one click, you can report available employees to the request. This way that the matching can take place in the shortest possible time.

3.title: Digitilisation
3.text: The administrative processes used by medlink reduce workload and improve the way organisations and agencies exchange information from providing applicants to invoicing.

1.title: simple and efficient - with medlink you can make HR planning easier and more intuitive than ever before
1.sub: The ideal replacement with just a few clicks. We help you to manage your vacancies efficiently and cost-effectively.

process.sub: Within a few minutes, medlink can help you find suitable replacement for a member of staff. Empowering you to save time as well as money.

1.title: Set up your internal staff pool
1.text: Every department defines their own internal staff pool and manages their staff. Each staff member gets their own login to receive, accept, and track yet to be filled shifts.

2.title: Request replacement
2.text: The department manager can upload a request in seconds. Our algorithms identify the best matches within your network and alerts them of the shift.

3.title: Availability
3.text: The pool of users can then accept or decline the request with a simple click. When multiple users reply positively, the department manager can select the replacement and the shift is filled. If no positive replies are given within a certain time-frame, the listing gets forwarded to the HR management which can then approve the request to be filled externally.

4.title: Connect with vetted staff through the platform
4.text: With a simple click the replacement request gets send out to numerous certified agencies. All paperwork regarding the replacement will still be covered by medlink; from communication and quality assurance to contracts and invoicing.

1.title: medlink is fast!
1.text: The speed of processing through medlink is a real plus for our personnel management - but also for the staff.
1.name: Petra Maier

2.title: medlink veringert unseren Stress
2.text: Previously, we needed over 1 hour to find a replacement, which was stressfull. With medlink this process only took 2 minutes.
2.name: Angela Pfortz

1.title: Full service provider
1.text: From managing the internal staff planning to the recruitment of external staff; medlink simplifies and automates all processes in the personnel value chain in digital form.

2.title: Quality assurance
2.text: medlink certifies all agencies to guarantee the highest quality of healthcare personell reassured through our rating system.

3.title: Efficient allocation
3.text: The optimal use of internal staffing minimises the use of external recruitment and significantly reduces costs.

4.title: Individual fit
4.text: Utilise individual, digital tools specifically designed for your requirements.

5.title: Find personell easy
5.text: Every aspect of filling a vacancy is covered by medlink and allows for a quick an best fitting outcome.

6.title: Data analysis
6.text: Use our Dashboard to provide you with the data you need to see to indicate your performance. We ensure to fulfill the best security requirements as laid out by EU-DSGVO and BDSG.
